title: The Raging Bull Edition
description:
White-collar crime, the aging bull market, and Greece’s exit from its bailout on this week's episode with Felix Salmon, Anna Szymanski, and Emily Peck.
In the Slate Plus segment, Felix, Anna, and Emily discuss NYU’s plan for tuition-free med school.
Email: slatemoney@slate.comTwitter:@felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas, @EmilyRPeck.Production by Max Jacobs.
Listen to Slate Money via Apple Podcasts, Overcast, Spotify, Stitcher, or Google Play.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
